title: Oraalppokkam (2014)
overview: Oraalppokkam [Six feet high] is a people funded independent Malayalam movie. This road movie has been shot in the tough terrains of Himalayas.
storyline: Mahendran and Maya split up from a living together relationship, on the very day in which they completed 5 years. Though initially Mahendran feels it as refreshing, in a few days he realize that Maya is the integral part of his ego. memories of Maya invade his dreams and consciousness.. once he gets a call from Maya from Kedar, a Himalayan valley. He talks to her till his phone dies out-of battery. On the next morning Mahendran wakes up to the television reports of a Himalayan tsunami in which the entire Kedar valley is destroyed. He tries to contact Maya, but he couldn't connect the phone. Disturbed, Mahendran starts an aimless journey which eventually turns out to be a search for Maya - He reaches a place where illusions rules reality.
